channel.title: Halo 3 Vid
channel.description:
[url=http://www.gamevee.com/viewVideo/Halo_3/XBox_360/Team_Snipers__SharpShooter/757136]Go Here[/url]
Thats a vid of me getting my SharpShooter on Xbox Live on Team Snipers;)
Give me a rating on my skill level ;) 1 / 10

item.title: Halo 3 Vid
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

No its completely simple, they are saying i suck when they cant even play half as good thats like someone saying you suck at GOW2 even though its not out… So if your rating it bad and you cant even do half as better then, i have a solution just stfu and get over yourself.

R.I.P RSC are you seriously gonna call me a cock sucker?? Seriously kid i would beat the living fuck out of you if you said that too my face. Your gonna call someone that you dont even know a cock sucker. Wow kid your fucking kool.

And besides im not flaming im getting pissed off at the kids that do this fucking shit…

ThAt0n36Uy:

Wow you fucking suck.

You’re bragging about getting a Sharp shooter? Pretty sure I get them nearly every game. They’re not that hard, the Sniper is 2 hit kill anywhere except the head. No scoping on Halo 3 is easy.

A tip: Turn your sensitivity up, you’ll find it easier to quick-turn-scope people.

Heh,you must be playing…really really bad people if you get them every game.
[/quote]
Yes, that may be a possibility, but I pretty much always play Ranked.

All I’m saying is Sharpshooter is nothing to be proud of.[/quote][quote=“Frell, post:6, topic:228850”]COD4 > gaylo[/quote]

Read full topic

Wait, first you expect people to rate your poor gaming, and then when they are being honest you softly, but still, flame them? People like you have names: cocksuckers.

item.title: Halo 3 Vid

item.description:

You’re bragging about getting a Sharp shooter? Pretty sure I get them nearly every game. They’re not that hard, the Sniper is 2 hit kill anywhere except the head. No scoping on Halo 3 is easy.

A tip: Turn your sensitivity up, you’ll find it easier to quick-turn-scope people.

Heh,you must be playing…really really bad people if you get them every game.

Yes, that may be a possibility, but I pretty much always play Ranked.

All I’m saying is Sharpshooter is nothing to be proud of.

Whats ur gamertag because if its Yz85Racer you have never gotten a sharpshooter and you completely suck.
[/quote]
rofl i could own you…

http://www.bungie.net/stats/halo3/CareerStats.aspx?player=CaN%20I%20HaS%20r3c0n&social=true&map=0

and i don’t play grifball…[/quote]

Social stats…wow,nice try.

http://www.bungie.net/stats/Halo3/CareerStats.aspx?player=Xxfrost21xX - Mine

I got to about 45 in team doubles in about 55games or so,then just started letting a friend play and yea stopped playing after that practically.
